verbose_text: Once HCC was induced, a pair of thymidine analogs, 1-(2 '-deoxy-2 '-[18 F] fluoro-beta-D-arabinofuranosyl) thymine (D-FMAU) and 1-(2 '-deoxy-2 '-[18 F] fluoro-beta-L-arabinofuranosyl) thymine (L-FMAU) XREF_BIBR, were compared for PET imaging of tk expression in this unique mouse model of induced HCC.
